validate that.from sentence: The results validate that GCNs are effective at encoding syntactic information .

inducing.from sentence: Further , the improvement from side information shows that it is complementary to the features extracted from text , thus validating the central thesis of this paper , that inducing side information leads to improved relation extraction .

best.from sentence: We find that the model performs best when aliases are provided by the KB itself .

RESIDE.from sentence: Overall , we find that RESIDE gives competitive performance even when very limited amount of relation alias information is available .

observe.from sentence: We observe that performance improves further with the availability of more alias information .
